sentences.sContent: Quilting a bed cover can be laborious.
sentences.sCn: 缝制一个床罩会很费力的。

phrases.pCn: 拼布床单；用小块布缝缀的被罩

remMethod.val: 他辞职(quit)后就天天躺在被窝(quilt)里度日

words.tran: 被上缝花纹的缝法；缝被子

trans.tranOther: If you quilt, or if you quilt a piece of fabric, you make a quilt
a warm thick cover for a bed, made by sewing two layers of cloth together, with feathers or a thick material in between them
